page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT FARMING
page.content:
BEING A RURAL AREA MOST OF THE WORKFORCE IS CONCENTRATED ON THE FARMS, BEING EMPLOYED AS DSIRYMEN OR GENERAL FARM WORKERS. A FEW PEOPLE TRAVEL DAILY 25KM TO STRANRAER TO WORK IN SHOPS, OFFICES AND FACTORIES.
{FARMING} OTHER THAN THE VILLAGE THE AREA IS TOTALLY COVERED BY FARM LAND. THE MAIN TYPE IS DAIRY FARMING WITH 2 OR 3 CONCENTRATING ON BEEF AND 3 WITH A MIXTURE OF BEEF AND SHEEP.DUE TO WEATHER CONDITIONS NOT A GREAT DEAL OF CEREALS IS GROWN, BARLEY BEING THE ONLY ONE IN QUANTITY.THE MAIN CROP IS GRASS TO GIVE WINTER FEED OF SILAGE.
